pages.name: Crack of the Fractured Crystal
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.
Breaks $(raw)Demon Will$() Crystal Clusters of all aspects within its range, dropping the results on top of the crystals.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Crystal) All $(raw)Demon Will$() crystal clusters have a single crystal broken off, spawning the crystal into the world. If there is only one crystal on the cluster, it will not break it. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: 250 $(li)Horizontal Radius: 5 $(li)Vertical Radius: 7
